subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
This is to notify you that after a tripartite meeting held on the 10th
of July, 2023 between my office and the approved referral bank (UNITED
STANDARD  BANK  CALIFORNIA) regarding the instant ONLINE BANKING
ACCOUNT transfer of your over due Investment Fund Deposit (I.F.D.)
At the end of the meeting a communique was issued and your payment
file immediately sent to the UNITED STANDARD  BANK  CALIFORNIA UNITED
STATES OF AMERICA for the immediate release of this fund to your
designated receiving bank account co-ordinates.
SEND THE BELOW INFORMATION'S.
--------------------------------------------------
1.YOUR BANK NAMES AND ADDRESS.-----------------------------------------
2.YOUR BANK SWIFT CODE AND ROUTING CODE.-------------------------------
3.YOUR BANK ACCOUNT NUMBER.--------------------------------------------
4.
YOUR INTERNATIONAL AND WORKING ID CARD
.------------------------------
5.YOUR PRIVATE CELL PHONE NUMBER.----------------------------------
6.YOUR CONTRACT AMOUNT AMOUNT THAT HAS APPROVED FOR PAYMENT IS
$10.MUSD-----------
Finally as soon as you send the required information's above the
contact of the paying Bank where your funds will be paid will be
given to you to reach them for easy communication and for the release
of your funds payment.
Your urgent response is highly expected.
Yours faithfully
Ms Stella Jack.
Feel Free to call me.
Secretary Minister of Finance.
Ms Stella Jack.
Special Adviser(Mr Musa Malik)
Secretary Minister of Finance
Federal Government of Nigeria.

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Ms. Stella Jack,

Thank you for your email. However, I must inform you that I am not expecting any investment fund deposit from Nigeria or any other country. 

I believe there may be a mistake or misunderstanding. Could you please provide more details about this matter?

Best wishes,
Michael
